issue.title: [R] Unable to install arrow R package in Linux
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16004](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16004). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I am unable to install the arrow R package with all features. See the full installation output attached.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16004?focusedCommentId=17511888) by Dragoș Moldovan-Grünfeld (dragosmg):*
Hi `[~solmos]`. Is this still an issue? I saw in the install logs you provided you also bumped into the jfrog.artifactory.io issue. Our CI pipelines were also affected by it a couple of days ago.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16004?focusedCommentId=17517367) by Sergio Olmos (solmos):*
I guess that was the problem. I was able to install a few days later. Thanks for checking

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16004?focusedCommentId=17518063) by Jacob Wujciak-Jens (assignUser):*
Caused by external problem with jfrog.artifactory.io.
